name: Touhou Flight Simulator 东方模拟飞行
name_original: Touhou Flight Simulator 东方模拟飞行
description:
Become Reimu or Marisa, fly freely around the sky of Gensokyo!

Play with keyboard: Normal difficulty

Play with controller: Enjoyable difficulty

WASD and (Arrow keys or IJKL)

Programming & Art: Hefan

Characters are modelled using Vroid Studio

Some asset from unity asset store, to be listed
